title: League of Legends is definitely not a Team game.
body:
League of Legends is all about one guy doing all the work while teammates enjoy getting carried. I don't even see the point in trying to even help them with anything. 

1. They don't listen to pings
2. They don't accept any advice
3. All they do is feed then find someone to blame for their feeding.
4. If one person afks the whole team suffers and loses league points.
5. It's the hardest thing in the world to try to get people to group in soloque.

Why can anyone call this a team game....the only teamwork I see only exists on the enemy team.
